critique: The executive order aims to evoke fear and disgust towards Ansar Allah (the Houthis) due to their terrorist activities. It also intends to convey a sense of resolve and determination to eliminate their capabilities, which might be interpreted as a form of anger directed at the Houthis' actions. There is a slight element of surprise regarding the extent and frequency of the Houthis' attacks. There is no element of joy or sadness.
